about_the_game:
The ducks have started playing tricks to get closer to the toast! Fight disguised ducks across multiple dimensions in the first-ever Toast Defense DLC!

The Toast Defense Aesthetics Pack lets players choose from a variety of different skins to play with. Fight wizard ducks in the desert, or fight against ducks with sunglasses in the snow! Change the world to look how you want it to look like in this Aesthetic Pack!

DLC includes the following skins (any future additional skins will be added to this DLC, there will not be another aesthetic pack):
Grass Skins
  • Seafarers Skins
  • Desert Skin
  • Arcana Skin
  • Magma Skin
  • Snow Skin
  • Faded Skin
Path Skins
  • Arcana Skin
  • Snow Skin
  • Faded Skin
Duck Skins
  • Arcana Skins
  • Sunglasses Skins
  • Winter Skins
  • Pirate Skins

name: Toast Defense - Aesthetics Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-Bit) SP1+
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
